text: Absolutely love this branch of i love taimei, have been going here for many times already and its always the best quality drinks, super fresh, flavourful and perfectly balanced. My fav is the mango yakult green tea, not too sweet n the pearls vv chewy 👍👍👍 Service from Gvon and Michelle were also the best, always friendly and eager to serve! super fast, highly recommend

I recently visited I Love Taimei at the Hillion Mall Outlet and was blown away by the warm, welcoming atmosphere created by their incredible staff! From the moment I walked in, the staff greeted me with genuine smiles and this made my visit more enjoyable. Their friendliness and attentiveness truly made the experience memorable—special shoutout to the staff member who patiently walked me through the menu and even recommended their personal favorites!

Now, here’s the great thing: I had no idea there was a voucher set included when paying for a meal and drink! What a fantastic surprise! This added value made my visit even better, and I’ll definitely be back to take advantage of this offer again. It’s little touches like these—paired with outstanding service—that keep customers like me coming back.

Thank you, I Love Taimei team from Hillion, for your kindness, warmth, and for making my day brighter. I’ll be recommending you to everyone I know. Keep up the amazing work!

Pro tip: Don’t forget to ask whether there’s any set meals or vouchers—it’s a game-changer!

Also, the food was delicious, and the drinks? Absolute perfection. 10/10!
I am big shopee noon flash deals for I Love Taimei and always on lookout for the drink+ chicken cutlet set ❤️ Happy to be able to redeem from Hillion outlet 👍🏻

Gevon at I Love Taimei, Hillion Mall, provided exceptional service! Her warm smile, attentive nature, and knowledgeable recommendations made our visit truly outstanding. Gevon is a shining star of the team! Not forgetting the rest as well! Ordered during peak hours before and they were fast! Not long waiting time. Keep up the good work 👍🏻👍🏻

I would like to compliment Jvon from Hillion. She is friendly, patience and helpful. She gave me good recommendations when I’m not sure what to order. The best thing is I love the food she recommended. Thanks to her for such good advice.
